name: Geometry Dash 3D
description:
This is a very early version of the game.

There may be many bugs.

You can watch how I made the game on my YouTube channel.

This is a 3D parody of a 2D game Geometry Dash

Links to the original game:

Play Market: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.robtopx.geometryjump&hl=ru&gl=...

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/322170/Geometry_Dash

If you support this project, then I will continue to develop, make new levels, with new mechanics that are not in the original because of the 2D view. It should be interesting. Have a nice game!
